CustomField.description: Estimated Hours - Only populates if the assignment is billable and EVA record represents a future week. Once the week passes, the value changes to 0
CustomField.formula: IF(AND( pse__End_Date__c > TODAY() , Billable__c = True), pse__Estimated_Hours__c, 0)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Estimated Hours - Only populates if the assignment is billable and EVA record represents a future week. Once the week passes, the value changes to 0
CustomField.label: Scheduled Billable Hours
